details.description:
Fred recently gained his Masters in Digital Asset Management from King's College London, where he completed a dissertation on Open Government Data engagement. Following a summer internship with the ODI Fred will be working with Tom Heath and other members of the team on developing various research projects, as well as looking ahead at future research potential.

With an undergraduate degree in International Relations, Fred has particular interests in matters of policy, governance, and democracy, as well as digital information management and open data. Fred is passionate about environmental issues and climate change - on which he wrote his undergraduate dissertation - and in his spare time enjoys reading, fine ales, and plenty of ballet dancing.
